entry.title: Close an open port on the Mac
entry.content:
1. Find out the process ID (PID) which is occupying the port number (e.g., 5955) you would like to free
    sudo lsof -i :5955

  2. Kill the process which is currently using the port using its PID
    sudo kill -15 PID

entry.title: PostgreSQL config files
entry.content:
Find config files in PostgreSQL:
SHOW config_file

Find hba conf in PostgreSQL:
SHOW hba_file

entry.title: Install JDK
entry.content:
Get local JDK paths:
/usr/libexec/java_home -V

On Ubuntu:
sudo apt update
sudo apt-get install openjdk-8-jdk
